Great Jobs

Goal 1. Good Paying Jobs and Assistance - No Poverty

Google API via Javascript

Using Javascript and NodeJS to call Google Data Commons API.

You can find the DCID and property value using:

  • Data Commons Place Browser
  • Data Commons StatVar Browser
  • Data Commons Browser

Based on REST API v2/observation example 3

variable.dcids: Count_Person, Count_Farm, LandCoverFraction_Forest

Include a [Relation Expression](https://docs.datacommons.org/api/rest/v2#relation-expressions) (property value) to call v2/node API
->* means an 'out' arc with all the properties linked to this node.
<- means an 'in' arc.
Variable DCIDs:
Property (v2/node)
JSON Output from Google Data Commons API

NodeJS

Yarn Build into dist/jobs folder

The client-side version of the following resides within index.html and uses
components/data-loader-earth.js.

Built with Observable and Google Data Commons by our Model.earth Project Team.
